formatted_address: 40 Pasir Panjang Rd, #02-40 Food Park, Mapletree Business City II, Singapore 117383
name: Khansama @ Pasir Panjang

reviews.text:
Instantly became my favorite Indian restaurant! Their butter chicken, biryani rice, and chicken tikka were all amazing. I usually have low spice tolerance, but somehow, I managed to enjoy their spicy chicken‚Äîit was that good! Ended the meal with gulab jamun, which had just the right level of sweetness.

Went here for the first time to celebrate my colleagues‚Äô promotions, and I‚Äôm glad I joined. Definitely coming back!

Went to to this North Indian joint for meal which is located withiin Alexander business park.

Had the buffet, which was self service with the dishes. From nann, rice to curry & dessert. Decent variety of dishes. The mutton curry was flavorful, maybe more spicier would be pleasing. The bread was done in the premises, was served hot. Dishes were replenished frequently. Thought some dishes were interesting, as I wasn't sure what was the dish, I asked the staffs, one mentioned it was cheese and other said it was tofu..

The place was packed with people from the area during my visit. Fortunately I went prior the lunch crowd came. Friendly service staff.

Very good ambience. Perfect location from a point of view of accessibility. Excellent service with a smile‚ÄîI would commend Manpreet and Sonia for this.  Good food. We took our Korean clients to this restaurant, and they loved the food and the atmosphere. They also have a bar attached to this restaurant, so you can order beers, liquors, and wines.  I have posted photos of the food and drink menu so one can get an idea of the items available as well as the cost. This place is good for a family dinner, friend gathering or a business dinner. All in all, a good place to have good food with an ambience and excellent service.

"Thank you so much - for the excellent job of Catering. Your wonderful Customer Service with personal touch and Delicious Food made our event special!" Great Lohri arrangements where it was the best Bonfire üî•ü•ú any of us had enjoyed in years! It was indeed a memorable celebration and the credit goes to Khansama team üëèüèªüëèüèª

Thank you Khansama Restaurant for the amazing food. From the setting up of the dinner tables to clearing arrangements after the event, everything was well organised. Their serving size is generous. Did an excellent job. Our guests loved the delicious spread. Special thanks to Mr Mukesh Kumar & his team for the excellent service.

vicinity: 40 Pasir Panjang Road, #02-40 Food Park, Mapletree Business City II
